intro: Rungia elegans, commonly known as the elegant rungia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenia plants. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that are often clustered in terminal inflorescences. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a glossy appearance. Rungia elegans is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and delicate floral display.
